lv.edi.EDI_3DAtA.bloodvesselsegm

Class SMFeatureExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • lv.edi.EDI_3DAtA.bloodvesselsegm.SMFeatureExtractor

  • public class SMFeatureExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Code - Riƒçards Cacurs. Class representing Stacked Multiscale Feature extractor from paper: Adam Coates and Andrew Y. Ng "Learning Feature Representations with K-means", Neural Networks: Tricks of the Trade, 2nd edn, Springer, 2012.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SMFeatureExtractor

        public SMFeatureExtractor(VolumetricData volData,
                          java.lang.String filterBankFileName,
                          int kernelRows,
                          int kernelCols)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor constructing feature extractor.
        Parameters:
        filterBankFileName - file name for filterbanks.csv file. It is CSV file where each filter values are stored in separate lines, and values are stored in row-major order.
        kernelRows - filter bank kernel row size
        kernelCols - filter bank kernel column size
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws exception if specified filename cannot be read

    • Method Detail

      • getFilterBank

        public java.util.ArrayList<boofcv.struct.image.ImageFloat32> getFilterBank()
        Function return filter bank set in current Feature Extractor
        Returns:
        the filterBank. Return null if filter bank not specified.

      • setFilterBank

        public void setFilterBank(java.lang.String filterBankFileName,
                          int kernelRows,
                          int kernelCols)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Function for setting feature extractor filter-bank from .csv file containing filter kernel values.
        Parameters:
        filterBankFileName - path to the file. One row of file represents one filter values Values for each kernel must be specified in Col-Maj order.
        kernelRows - number of filter kernel rows
        kernelCols - number of filter kernel columns
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getVolData

        public VolumetricData getVolData()
        Function for accessing VolumetricData object for which FeatureExtractor currently is set.
        Returns:

      • setVolData

        public void setVolData(VolumetricData volData)
        Function for setting VolumetricData object on which FeatureExtractor will operate.
        Parameters:
        volData - data on which feature extractor will operate.
